description.text: Harry says a new kid is coming to JoeRunner and T.T.’s class.
description.html: Harry says a new kid is coming to JoeRunner and T.T.’s class.

lines.d: JoeRunner, T.T., and Harry are sitting at a table. JoeRunner looks up from a book as Harry speaks, pointing at JoeRunner and T.T.
Oh, hey, I heard from my father that your class is getting a new kid.
She’s a girl, actually. She just moved from France.
(raising eyebrows) Wait . . . They have girls in France?

content.html:
Irrelevant info

JoeRunner gets to be in the thumbnail for his own comic again.

When I first wrote this, T.T. said that he didn’t know what a girl was; I changed it later, because I decided that that wasn’t very T.T.-like. Also, this is probably funnier anyway. I’ll have to post the original draft at some point, I guess. The drawing in this page is probably some of my worst. I hate my art so much, but I’m posting it on the internet forever anyway.

Remember when I said I was going to get a page a week done? Yeah. I’m a riot.
